Key Match Events: Nick Castellanos hit a two-run homer in the first inning
Weston Wilson's swinging bunt single in the sixth inning scored Castellanos from third to give the Phillies the lead
Post-Match Reflections: The Phillies have an eight-game lead over the Mets in the NL East with 16 games to play
The rivals open a three-game series on Friday night at Citizens Bank Park
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Phillies played without Alec Bohm and J.T. Realmuto for the entire series
They played more than half the series without Kyle Schwarber
Others: Zack Wheeler allowed two runs on four hits and three walks in six innings
